title: Disarming Attack
content:
(Fighter Subclass)Martial Adept (Feat) grants this feature.

Disarming Attack is a Passive Feature in Baldur's Gate 3. Disarming Attack has 2 variants of action where the player can disarm an enemy from melee or ranged distance. Features provide unique abilities that are inherent to a Character's Race, Class, Background selected. These may vary greatly, from allowing you to equip certain Weapons or pieces of Armor with Proficiency, to add your Proficiency Bonus to certain Saving Throws.
